context: I like Station Eleven can you tell me more about it
Definitely! Station Eleven was written by Emily St. John Mandel in 2014. I don't have information on it's genre, but I do know that it was released the same year as Wicked.
Great thank you. did Emily write anything else?
Unfortunately the information I have shows this is her only authoring, did you have any other interests?
Yes is there a book similar to station Eleven

Actually upon further review, there is another book written by Mandel, titled Last Night In Montreal. I checked a different source but this seems to be her only other entry. Another similar book is The Bone Clocks.
Ok great thank what type of book is Last night?
resp: it's of the genre psychological fiction, while Station Eleven is considered science and post apocalyptic fiction, are you interested in these genres?
